titleStmt.title: The prologue to His Majesty at the first play presented at the Cock-pit in Whitehall, being part of that noble entertainment which their Maiesties received Novemb. 19. from his Grace the Duke of Albemarle.
titleStmt.author: Denham, John, Sir, 1615-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for G. Bedell and T. Collins, at the Middle-Temple Gate in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: In verse - "Greatest of Monarchs, welcome to this place".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
